history.proof: intros. hfcrush use: Iter_rem_aux_equation inv: sumbool.

exceptions.tactic: intros m z t x H1 H2 H3 sr zn0 H4 H5.

ctx: remember (ndN m - card x)%nat as i.
remember (Iter (f m) i z) as zn.
tactic: destruct (exds_dec x zn) as [H7 | H7]; rewrite H7 in sr.
exceptions.exn: Cannot find an homogeneous relation to rewrite.

original: intros m z t x H1 H2 H3 sr zn0 H4 H5. unfold exds. intros H6. rewrite Iter_rem_aux_equation in sr. remember (ndN m - card x)%nat as i. remember (Iter (f m) i z) as zn. destruct (exds_dec x zn) as [H7 | H7]; rewrite H7 in sr. * apply H5. apply PL2; auto. * apply H6. apply PL2; auto.
